attributes.action: Delay the Multiplication Tables Check until it has been consulted on.
attributes.additional_details: This version of the Multiplication Tables Check has been designed to force schools to ensure that children rote learn their tables and deliver them in high-pressure exams at the age of 8, despite this being clearly unrealistic for many children.
attributes.background: The Multiplication Tables Check is due to become statutory for all children in year 4 this summer (2022).   This exam was created by one minister without meaningful consultation with the education community and, in its current form, is not fit for purpose.
